# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which we believe could significantly enhance the efficiency and profitability of your business operations. Given its unique features and capabilities, we estimate its value to be well above $10000. We are offering this exceptional product to you at an exclusive price of $15000. This opportunity is tailored to maximize the return on investment for your company. Should you choose to accept, we assure you of unparalleled support and customization options to meet your specific needs. We look forward to discussing how this product can revolutionize your business processes. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
